title: Pedagogical Design for Transitioning Anatomy Laboratories to Online Formats

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomy knowledge and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course for current practitioners, focusing on methodologies to design effective anatomy practical education under social distancing conditions

learning_goals: Identify at least three core educational elements of an online anatomy laboratory using the Delphi technique
Design at least two operational strategies for an online anatomy laboratory based on mixed research methods
Propose at least two technological design solutions to enhance learner engagement in mobile environments
Develop and apply one formative assessment tool for an online anatomy laboratory
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
